title: F45 Training Lead Gen Campaign
subheadline: How Toro Marketing Stopped Customer Attrition and Boosted Lead Growth and Conversion
summary: Toro Marketing teamed up with a holding company that owns multiple F45 Training studios across Alabama. Our goal: halt membership drop-offs and bring in fresh leads. We delved into their data and devised tailored strategies for each location, covering everything from boosting organic reach and running effective paid campaigns to managing CRM, and crafting compelling text and email marketing. Plus, we fine-tuned their pricing strategy to maximize results.

sections.title: Marketing Deliverables
sections.subheadline: Here’s what Toro Marketing delivered for F45 Training:

content.name: Local Brand Positioning and Ad Creative
content.description: With multiple F45 Training locations across different cities, we tailored messages that resonated with specific local audiences, catering to everyone from full-time professionals to students on a budget.

content.name: Paid Search Management
content.description: We crafted paid search ads featuring time-sensitive offers and strategically positioned them around F45’s unique value proposition of team building. This helped differentiate F45 from other gyms in the area quickly.

content.name: Google Store Management
content.description: Our team enhanced growth opportunities through creative support, managing customer reviews, and updating content like images, FAQs, holiday hours, and more to keep the listings accurate and engaging.

content.name: CRM Management and Outbound Marketing
content.description: We organized customer data meticulously, segmenting audiences for targeted messaging. Our strategies included win-back campaigns for lapsed members, retention efforts for at-risk customers, and tailored approaches for new and uncontacted customers alike.

content.name: Lead Conversion and Live Agent
content.description: Implementing automated messaging and live agent support in the final sales stages, we reduced response times from days to seconds. Customers received quick answers to queries about services, pricing, and deals, along with reminders and follow-ups before and after their first class, ensuring a seamless experience.
